current.title: Dimentia
current.description: Several characters awaken on a strange planet, held hostage by the Mantle of Chaos. Enslaved for divine entertainment, they try to discover who they are and find an escape. If there even is one.

upcoming.title: Parry The Floor
upcoming.description: With fading memories and a voice that won't keep quiet, Perry heeds its plea to ascend the Trial of Agility and meet the Mantle of Karma.

upcoming.title: Witch Way
upcoming.description: After narrow failure of her Mage Examination, Cassie is destined to a life of labour to benefit the castes above her.

upcoming.title: Spell Hunter
upcoming.description: The Spell Hunter. The near height of the caste system on Seryph. A life full of exploration and discovery at the behest of the Mantle of Fabryka.
